revised_title: Volatile Inter-Metallic Compounds: The Absorption Spectra of Mixed Metallic Vapours
tldr: This article discusses the absorption spectra of mixed metallic vapours, specifically volatile compounds of magnesium and alkali metals. The author describes the process of creating these compounds and their spectra, and suggests that these observations are the first direct evidence for the existence of volatile inter-metallic compounds. The study also investigates the possibility of chemical combination between magnesium and alkali metals.
